cnd20:2.2: Jinnohamasmiti jinno vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto visavassasatiko jatiya.
cnd20:2.5: Ya sa purima subha vannanibha sa antarahita, adinavo patubhutoti—
cnd20:4.1: Netta na suddha savanam na phasuti netta asuddha avisuddha aparisuddha avodata.
cnd20:4.4: Savanam na phasuti sotam asuddham avisuddham aparisuddham avodatam.
cnd20:4.6: netta na suddha savanam na phasu.
cnd20:5.2: Maham nassanti maham nassam maham vinassam maham panassam.
cnd20:5.4: Antaravati tuyham dhammam ditthim patipadam maggam anannaya anadhigantva aviditva appatilabhitva aphassayitva asacchikaritva antarayeva kalam kareyyanti—
cnd20:6.2: Dhammanti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam, cattaro satipatthane, cattaro sammappadhane, cattaro iddhipade, pancindriyani, panca balani, satta bojjhange, ariyam atthangikam maggam, nibbananca nibbanagamininca patipadam acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd20:6.4: Yamaham vijannanti yamaham janeyyam ajaneyyam vijaneyyam pativijaneyyam pativijjheyyam adhigaccheyyam phasseyyam sacchikareyyanti—
cnd20:7.1: Jatijaraya idha vippahananti idheva jatijaramaranassa pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd20:8.3: Netta na suddha savanam na phasu;
cnd20:10.2: Rupanti cattaro ca mahabhuta catunnanca mahabhutanam upadaya rupam.
cnd20:10.3: Satta rupahetu rupappaccaya rupakarana hannanti vihannanti upahannanti upaghatiyanti.
cnd20:10.5: Kasahipi talenti, vettehipi talenti, addhadandakehipi talenti, hatthampi chindanti, padampi chindanti, hatthapadampi chindanti, kannampi chindanti, nasampi chindanti, kannanasampi chindanti, bilangathalikampi karonti, sankhamundikampi karonti, rahumukhampi karonti, jotimalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti, cirakavasikampi karonti, eneyyakampi karonti, balisamamsikampi karonti, kahapanikampi karonti, kharapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palalapithakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osincanti, sunakhehipi khadapenti, jivantampi sule uttasenti, asinapi sisam chindanti.
cnd20:10.6: Evam satta rupahetu rupappaccaya rupakarana hannanti vihannanti upahannanti upaghatiyanti.
cnd20:10.7: Evam hannamane vihannamane upahannamane upaghatiyamane disva passitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
cnd20:12.2: Ruppantiti ruppanti kuppanti pilayanti ghattayanti, byadhita domanassita honti.
cnd20:12.3: Cakkhurogena ruppanti kuppanti pilayanti ghattayanti, byadhita domanassita honti.
cnd20:12.6: damsamakasavatatapasarisapasamphassehi ruppanti kuppanti pilayanti ghattayanti, byadhita domanassita hontiti—
cnd20:13.1: Atha va cakkhusmim hiyamane hayamane parihayamane vemane vigacchamane antaradhayamane ruppanti …pe…
cnd20:13.22: gilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharasmim hiyamane hayamane parihayamane vemane vigacchamane antaradhayamane ruppanti kuppanti pilayanti ghattayanti, byadhita domanassita hontiti—
cnd20:14.1: Janati khattiya ca brahmana ca vessa ca sudda ca gahattha ca pabbajita ca deva ca manussa ca.
cnd20:14.2: Pamattati pamado vattabbo kayaduccaritena va vaciduccaritena va manoduccaritena va pancasu kamagunesu cittassa vosaggo vosagganuppadanam kusalanam va dhammanam bhavanaya asakkaccakiriyata asataccakiriyata anatthitakiriyata olinavuttita nikkhittacchandata nikkhittadhurata anasevana abhavana abahulikammam anadhitthanam ananuyogo pamado.
cnd20:15.2: Tasmati tasma tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana evam adinavam sampassamano rupesuti—
cnd20:16.2: Rupanti cattaro ca mahabhuta catunnanca mahabhutanam upadaya rupam.
cnd20:16.3: Jahassu rupanti jahassu rupam, pajahassu rupam, vinodehi rupam, byantikarohi rupam, anabhavam gamehi rupam.
cnd20:16.4: Apunabbhavayati yatha te rupam idheva nirujjheyya, punapatisandhiko bhavo na nibbatteyya kamadhatuya va rupadhatuya va arupadhatuya va, kamabhave va rupabhave va arupabhave va, sannabhave va asannabhave va nevasannanasannabhave va, ekavokarabhave va catuvokarabhave va pancavokarabhave va, puna gatiya va upapattiya va patisandhiya va bhave va samsare va vatte va na janeyya na sanjaneyya na nibbatteyya nabhinibbatteyya, idheva nirujjheyya vupasameyya attham gaccheyya patippassambheyyati—
cnd20:19.1: Disa catasso vidisa catasso, uddham adho dasa disa imayoti dasa disa.
cnd20:20.1: Na tuyham adittham asutam amutam, atho avinnatam kincanamatthi loketi na tuyham adittham asutam amutam avinnatam kinci attattho va parattho va ubhayattho va ditthadhammiko va attho samparayiko va attho uttano va attho gambhiro va attho gulho va attho paticchanno va attho neyyo va attho nito va attho anavajjo va attho nikkileso va attho vodano va attho paramattho va attho natthi na atthi na samvijjati nupalabbhatiti—
cnd20:20.2: na tuyham adittham asutam amutam, atho avinnatam kincanamatthi loke.
cnd20:21.3: nibbananca nibbanagamininca patipadam acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehi.
cnd20:21.4: Yamaham vijannanti yamaham janeyyam ajaneyyam vijaneyyam pativijaneyyam pativijjheyyam adhigaccheyyam phasseyyam sacchikareyyanti—
cnd20:22.1: Jatijaraya idha vippahananti idheva jatijaramaranassa pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd20:25.3: Tanhadhipanneti tanhadhipanne tanhanuge tanhanugate tanhanusate tanhaya panne patipanne abhibhute pariyadinnacitte.
cnd20:26.2: Santapajateti jatiya santapajate, jaraya santapajate, byadhina santapajate, maranena santapajate, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasehi santapajate, nerayikena dukkhena santapajate …pe…
cnd20:26.3: ditthibyasanena dukkhena santapajate itijate upaddavajate upasaggajateti—
cnd20:26.5: Jarasa pareteti jaraya phutthe parete samohite samannagate.
cnd20:26.6: Jatiya anugate jaraya anusate byadhina abhibhute maranena abbhahate atane alene asarane asaranibhuteti—
cnd20:27.2: Tasmati tasma tankarana tamhetu tappaccaya tamnidana evam adinavam sampassamano tanhayati—
cnd20:28.3: Jahassu tanhanti jahassu tanham pajahassu tanham vinodehi tanham byantikarohi tanham anabhavam gamehi tanham.
cnd20:28.5: punapatisandhiko bhavo na nibbatteyya kamadhatuya va rupadhatuya va arupadhatuya va, kamabhave va rupabhave va arupabhave va, sannabhave va asannabhave va nevasannanasannabhave va, ekavokarabhave va catuvokarabhave va pancavokarabhave va, punagatiya va upapattiya va patisandhiya va bhave va samsare va vatte va na janeyya na sanjaneyya na nibbatteyya nabhinibbatteyya, idheva nirujjheyya vupasameyya attham gaccheyya patippassambheyyati—
cnd20:30.1: Saha gathapariyosana ye te brahmanena saddhim ekacchanda ekapayoga ekadhippaya ekavasanavasita, tesam anekapanasahassanam virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi—
cnd20:30.3: Tassa ca brahmanassa virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi—
cnd20:30.5: Saha dhammacakkhussa patilabha ajinajatavakaciratidandakamandalukesa ca massu ca antarahita bhandukasayavatthavasano sanghatipattacivaradharo anvatthapatipattiya panjaliko bhagavantam namassamano nisinno hoti—
